## About

Dr. Tora Bonnevie is a research scientist at the Kavli Institute for Systems Neuroscience, leading the AD Time project. Her research focuses on understanding the temporal dynamics of Alzheimer's disease progression.

## Research Interests

- Temporal progression of AD
- Neural circuit dynamics
- Disease mechanisms
- Early intervention strategies
